rakka satana yanu, rakka nagarayehi wana irakaye saha lewanthaye islamiya rajyaya (ayiesayiel) thaththwakara aganagarayata erehiwa siriyanu prajathanthrawadi balakayan (esdief) wisin diyath kerunu rakka meheyumehi paswana saha awasana adiyarayi. 2017 juni 6 dinadi arambaunu mema satana wetha, eja-peratu sandhanaya wisin sahaya laba denne guwan prahara ella kirima saha bhumi sena kandayam yedawima thulini.
